existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and a minimal user profile identity used throughout the app (display name derived from the authenticated principal, with an optional editable nickname).
Create frontend screens to browse questions, view a question detail page, and allow signed-in users to post new questions and post answers to existing questions.

Add an in-app “AI can also answer questions” feature: on the Question Detail page, allow users to request an AI-style supportive response, generated deterministically on-canister (no external AI/LLM API) using templates/heuristics, and store it as a special answer type attributed to “Big Sister AI”.

Establish a cohesive visual theme suitable for a supportive women-focused Q&A community (warm, calm, editorial feel; accessible typography; consistent spacing and components) and apply it consistently across the app.
Generate and include a small set of static brand assets and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).

Add a “Connect Wallet” entry point in the UI for signed-in users that lets them link a crypto wallet address to their Ask Big Sister profile/session without relying on third-party wallet integrations.
Implement the frontend flow to view, add, edit, and remove the linked wallet address using the new backend APIs, including basic validation and error handling.

Add a new Match-3 game screen that runs entirely in the browser: render a 2D grid of bright, cut-stone tiles; allow the player to swap adjacent tiles via mouse/touch; detect matches of 3 or more identical tiles; clear matched tiles; drop tiles down to fill gaps; and refill with new random tiles.
Add basic game HUD and controls: show current score, a simple restart/new game control, and a short on-screen instruction block explaining how to play (English).

Integrate the Match-3 game into the existing React app navigation by adding a clear entry point from the current UI (e.g., in the header menu and/or the home page) and register the new route in the app router.
Apply a bright, stone-themed visual style to the game screen: vivid gem/stone colors, high-contrast readable HUD text, and a playful arcade feel consistent across the game UI.
Add static image assets for the match-3 game as generated files under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the game UI (tiles and optionally a background).

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow users to post/ask questions to the community
Allow users to answer/reply to other users' questions
Provide an AI feature that can also answer questions
Add backend data models and APIs to create and fetch community questions (including title, body, author, createdAt) and to list questions in reverse chronological order with basic pagination support.
Add backend data models and APIs to create and fetch answers for a given question (including body, author, createdAt), and return answers ordered from oldest to newest by default.
Add a “Connect Wallet” feature to the Ask Big Sister app (allow users to connect a crypto wallet to their account/session).

Extend the backend user profile model to store an optional wallet address string for each authenticated principal, and provide canister methods to read/update/clear the wallet address for the current signed-in user.
Create a 2D match-3 game: match 3+ identical cut-stone tiles to earn points, using a bright stone-themed color palette.
